name: Plumber Run (cansix1)
description:
*/Developer

-Muhammet Fatih Yılmaz

*/Descriptions

- Use arrow keys or "A" or "D" keys for horizontal movement.

- Try to right direction by clicking on the pipes to solve the puzzle.

- Try to finish the level before time runs out.

- Best compatible with full screen.
